Name: Zen Chess: Mate in Two
About the game: ZenChess: Mate in Two is a minimalist chess puzzle game. * Designed for chess lovers of all levels (even if you just learned how to move the pieces); * Solve 150 carefully selected mate-in-two puzzles; * Enjoy a minimalist, beautifully designed chess board and pieces; * Original soundtrack, specially composed to help you keep your focus and concentration; * Everything in the game was made with a lot of love and craftsmanship; Can you find the two moves that will solve each puzzle? Give it a try and show yourself you are a truly chess master.
